overview: In 1989, four teenage friends from Los Angeles had a chance encounter with "Bones Brigade" mastermind Stacy Peralta that would forever change their lives and the future of skateboarding. This is the story of “The L.A. Boys,” a new feature-length documentary by Colin Kennedy, featuring Gabriel Rodriguez, Paulo Diaz, Rudy Johnson, Guy Mariano, and many more skate legends.
title: The L.A Boys
